name: General Surgery Drapes
description: Essential sterile packs for general surgical interventions, featuring SMS Standard and Reinforced options.
longDescription: Our general surgery drape packs are engineered for maximum fluid control and sterile field integrity. Includes Universal, Mini, and Specialized sagging packs to meet diverse clinical requirements.

seo.title: General Surgery Drape Packs Manufacturer | KRG Medifabb
seo.description: Leading manufacturer of general surgical drapes and universal drape packs. Sterile, AAMI Level compliant medical disposables.

name: Orthopedic Surgery Drapes
description: Heavy-duty reinforced drapes and packs for major bone surgery, including TKR and THR sets.
longDescription: Designed for high-fluid and high-mechanical stress procedures. Our Ortho drapes feature reinforced adhesive zones, limb sleeves, and integrated fluid collection pouches for Knee, Hip, and Shoulder surgeries.

seo.title: Orthopedic Surgical Drapes & Packs | TKR THR Drapes India
seo.description: Specialized orthopedic drape packs including TKR, THR, and Hip U-Drapes. High-performance SMS fabric for orthopedic surgery.

name: Gynecology Surgery Drapes
description: Specialized OBG solutions for LSCS, normal delivery, and laparoscopic gynecology procedures.
longDescription: Our gynecology range features amniotic-control SMS fabrics, integrated incise films, and super-absorbent maternity pads. Optimized for patient dignity and clinical efficiency in delivery rooms.

seo.title: Gynecology & Obstetric Drape Packs | LSCS Delivery Kits
seo.description: Manufacturer of sterile gynecology drape packs, LSCS kits, and maternity mats in Chennai, India. Quality certified.

name: Other Surgery Drapes
description: Dedicated packs for Cardiovascular, Urology, Neurology, and IVF procedures.
longDescription: Comprehensive range of specialized drapes for niche surgical sectors. From CABG cardiac packs to Neurology craniotomy drapes and IVF procedure kits, we provide total sterile solutions for advanced specialties.

seo.title: Specialized Surgical Packs | Cardiac Urology Neuro Drapes
seo.description: High-complexity surgical drapes for Cardiology, Neurology, and Urology. Custom procedure packs available for global export.

name: Disposable Bed Sheets & Covering
description: Premium SMS & PP Spun Bond solutions for hospital beds, examination couches, and clinical covering.
longDescription: Our disposable bed sheets and covering sheets provide a superior moisture barrier and hygiene. Made from premium SMS and PP Spunbond fabrics as per international clinical standards.

seo.title: Disposable Hospital Bed Sheets & Covering Sheets | KRG Medifabb
seo.description: Premium disposable bed sheets and medical covering sheets for hospitals. Durable, hygienic, and cost-effective medical disposables.

name: Disposable Surgeon Gowns
description: High-performance protective apparel for surgical teams, featuring SMS Standard and Reinforced options.
longDescription: From SMS Standard to Wrap-around Reinforced protection, our surgeon gowns are designed for maximum safety in the OR. Available in various GSMs including poly aprons and isolation gowns.

seo.title: Sterile Surgeon Gowns Manufacturer | Surgical Gowns India
seo.description: Manufacturer of sterile surgical gowns, reinforced gowns, and isolation gowns in Chennai, India. Quality-certified for hospital use.

name: Disposable Patient Gowns/Kits
description: Full range of patient apparel including standard, full-sleeve, and sleeveless designs, plus pre-operative kits.
longDescription: Our patient gowns are lightweight, breathable, and provide excellent coverage. Available in various sleeve lengths and complete kits including bouffant caps, shoe covers, and patient towels.

seo.title: Disposable Patient Gowns & Pre-Operative Kits | KRG Medifabb
seo.description: Manufacturer of high-quality disposable patient gowns and clinical kits for pre-operative patient preparation.

name: Sterilization Wrapping Sheets
description: Clinical-grade SMS barrier sheets for instrument tray sterilization, available in standard and custom sizes.
longDescription: Made from high-performance SMS fabric (43/50 GSM), our wrapping sheets provide an effective microbial barrier. Available in multiple standard dimensions and customized sizes in packs of 25 and 50.

seo.title: Medical Sterilization Wrapping Sheets | SMS Fabric Wraps India
seo.description: High-quality SMS sterilization wrapping sheets for medical instrument trays. ISO certified and available in multiple sizes.

name: Ancillary Surgical Disposables
description: Essential protective covers and clinical accessories including C-Arm covers, Mayo covers, and protective sheeting.
longDescription: Our ancillary range provides complete sterile protection for clinical equipment and surgical staff. From specialized C-Arm and Camera covers to fluid-resistant leggings and shoe covers, we ensure a 360-degree sterile environment.

seo.title: Ancillary Surgical Disposables | Mayo C-Arm Camera Covers
seo.description: Buy high-quality medical equipment covers, shoe covers, and patient leggings. Specialized sterile disposables for professional operating rooms.
